website_summaries.verdict: This classic cruiser looks great and comes at a price that will save you some money towards your next beach vacation.
pros: Sports attractive colors that will stand out in your favorite beach community
Available in a 20-inch model that's perfect for teens and riders with small statures
cons: Some owners wish that it had hand brakes instead of peddle brakes

customer_reviews.title: can't ride bike due to defective parts,  no response from customer service
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived promptly and assembly went OK until I tried to rotate the handlebars into position. The recessed hex nut that serves as a "binder bolt" is frozen and will not turn in either direction. I used the proper 6mm allen wrench and even added a breaker bar and penetrating fluid but the hex nut will not budge. A possible cause is that powder coating was sprayed onto the hex nut after it was installed, which coated the threads. I can't ride the bike because the handlebar grips are out of reach. I've tried emails and numerous phone calls to customer service at Pacific Cycle but no luck. Now I'm stuck with a bike that I can't ride.
customer_reviews.author: garage guy

customer_reviews.title: Its going to do what we need it to do
customer_reviews.text: We're teaching our daughter to ride a bike and this will do nicely. She's nine and tall so we needed a 24" that would hold up. Its a very sturdy frame but the socket seems a little cheap, pedals could be better but once she learns to ride, this will not be her everyday bike. Happy with the purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A McMillon

customer_reviews.title: it needs  paddles it didn't come with bike paddles
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with bike paddles we need the bike paddles
customer_reviews.author: Maria F

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bike today and I am extremely satisfied with it! It is a beautiful bike, excellent paint job, and very high quality and well made. The only issue I had is it was missing one part in which I am sure I can get taken care of. It was missing a bolt piece. I put something there temporarily until I receive or get the bolt for it. I am exceptionally satisfied with this purchase! Beautiful bike, great value!!! During a pandemic like this it has been so very difficult to get a bike and they have been out of stock so long so I ordered this bike about a week ago and it came within about a week!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: IKEA furniture in bike form
customer_reviews.text: I love the end result but holly cow the hardest part of assembly was unscrewing things from how they came in the box. It took 2.5 hours to put together. Purchased a different bike from another company that took 35 minutes because things were not on so tightly and came with the required tools. It’s a lovely bike and a great price, just beware assembly is not a one person job and it might be worth the money to take it into a bike shop for professionals to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective! Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the bike just now, seat has a split right up middle. Very disappointed. Hoping they can just send us a new seat but can’t figure out how to reach a customer service rep. It’s our granddaughters bday present and looks like our only available option on line is to take it back to Kohl’s for drop off and reorder, which takes much longer, not to mention we already assembled the entire bike, when we just need the seat replaced :(
customer_reviews.author: doreen denlay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike. Easy to assemble. My 9 year old can ride it on the shortest setting. Shipped a lot sooner than we expected. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M

customer_reviews.title: NO Hand brakes .
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these . They have Pedal Brakes NOT hand brakes .
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: a cheap copy of famed cruiser
customer_reviews.text: The cruiser handle is not something which a rider would want, i have other cruiser better made, i can find better used bikes than this new one, nobody in the family wants to ride, i give five bucks to anybody over 5 ft to ride this bike and be able to make a turn, without putting feet down.
customer_reviews.author: Fire dragon and Fire dragoness

customer_reviews.title: bike
customer_reviews.text: overall it's a rare to find bike right now during the pandemic...so it serves it's purpose...wish the pedals were better quality
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ascoli

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for casual bike rides around town. It was easy to set up and looks very nice. The only negative is that it feel like its slightly dragging or pulling something. For the price it's a good value, although it is not a heavy bike it just rides a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K. Getz

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, no assembly tools
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks pretty good and my wife is in love with it... I’m giving it 3 stars because it came with no assembly tools
customer_reviews.author: Jrosario

customer_reviews.title: The Harley Davidson of Beach Cruisers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks awesome. We were pleasantly surprised with how good this bike looks in person, especially as we didn’t really want an orange bike. It’s more of a HD looking paint job. My 12yo loved it and gets compliments when riding by others.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: We read the reviews but loved the look of it and have had such great experiences with our purchases...but this bike came bent. We just wanted a replacement part and couldn’t get it. We were supposed to go and ship it back. Not wanting the hassle we took it to a bike store- $100 later it’s fixed. Go with another product. I’d buy a bike from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had an issue with this bike
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately when I was riding this bike, I was biking on the sidewalk and I was with someone. I came off a big curb and that’s how my back wheel was walloping and not only that the tire itself popped. I wonder if I can get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lettich

customer_reviews.title: Takes some time to assemble but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is for the 26 inch blue/purple bike. It’s awesome! Does take some pre-owned tools and an afternoon to put together but so worth it! Bike looks and rides great. For the price, it’s a good quality cruiser. I love my bike.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bike is awesome and perfect for shorter women I’m 5”2 The color is nice !! Great bike great price
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy for $160
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the value we received. Boxed very well with no damage. Worth $160 all day
customer_reviews.author: micky

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: Bike came over a week late but other than that it is pretty good but. It was a little tall for my daughter so their size chart wasn’t accurate but she’ll grow in to it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Bike
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this bike together myself, and then I bought a toddler seat to fit onto the back. I now ride around my neighborhood with my 3 year old in tow. Love this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jeffreys

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Waited and waited for this bike to arrive and now that it is here the back tire won’t hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Krick

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy ,
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy , the grip shifter only can use the middle range 2 3 4,
customer_reviews.author: Andre Lee

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Frame
customer_reviews.text: Besides the cute aesthetic and colors, this bike was a hunk of junk. First off, did not come with instructions. Second, after the bike was put together the seat would not stay up. This was a frame issue, not a seat issue. The frame would not hold the seat in place, it would fall as soon as someone sat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Richards

customer_reviews.title: Bike nice once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike once it was assembled. I had to hire someone to do that. It added another $50 to the cost.
customer_reviews.author: KZeller

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It says its a 7 speed , but its very heavy duty and flashy .
customer_reviews.author: Brad Landvik

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Really cute bike! Purchased for my seven year old daughter. Perfect size for her to grow into. Relatively easy assembly. Shipping said 2-3 months. Arrived in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Bienvenu

customer_reviews.title: happy with cruiser but....
customer_reviews.text: handle bar and front tire keeps gettting loose not balance, with that happening I cant get my daily exercise!!! is there anyone out there that can help me? I really want to ride my bike ... thank you
customer_reviews.author: dulce albano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble Very high quality for the price. Great bike.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my bike
customer_reviews.text: Love my bike! Great value for the money. Seat isn't super comfortable, but I just replaced it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike
customer_reviews.text: A decent bike for the price. Had to tweak fenders to avoid tire rub. Daughter enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin James Cox

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts needed
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts ...it did not come with the parts need to attach the seat ....very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Would not order
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Came with bent wheels. Unable to ride. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is prompt
customer_reviews.text: Still haven’t rode it yet since the the hex bolt in the quill stem was tightened by the Incredible Hulk. I called customer service and they promptly sent out a new quill stem. I just need to drill the old hex bolt out and replace it with the bolt from the new stem. Can’t wait to ride it
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN J.

customer_reviews.title: nice bike but very scraped and used
customer_reviews.text: this was supposed to be used like new but came with many scrapes and dents. This was supposed to be a Christmas present for my daughter and looks extremely used. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: stefanie kinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, whitewall tires & a wooden platform above the back tire. Was a bit difficult for me, as an older woman, to assemble, even though it came partially assembled. Overall, great bike!
customer_reviews.author: PetiteCadienne

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike. Easy to assemble, looks good. Fits someone who is 5 ft, 1 in tall. Comfy seat.
customer_reviews.author: TonytheTiger

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cruiser
customer_reviews.text: My 8 y/o daughter loves her bike! We live beachside in FL. Great cruiser for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Nice and smooth. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: thoai tran

customer_reviews.title: My daugher loves it and drives it everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great, easy to assemble bike. Put it together quickly and she's been riding it even just to go across the street :)
customer_reviews.author: CVold

customer_reviews.title: Will not order one again
customer_reviews.text: No. No oil or grease on the bike have to take the bike fully apart very hard to get it set up again
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins Ford

product_meta.title: Kulana Lakona Youth/Adult Beach Cruiser Bike, 20-26-Inch Wheels, Single - 7-Speeds, Multiple Colors
product_meta.description: Grab your shades and enjoy a laid-back ride with the Kulana Lakona Shore cruiser bike. Featuring a steel cruiser frame, the Lakona Shore is the perfect bike for the beach, boardwalk, or just riding around the neighborhood. The single speed drivetrain is easy to use and maintain, while the rear coaster (pedal) brake provides intuitive stopping power. The fenders help protect you from splashes and dust, while adding some sweet vintage flair. The Lakona Shore also includes an extra-large spring saddle for a comfortable, upright riding position. Enjoy a relaxing ride with the Lakona Shore by Kulana.
feature_bullets: Durable steel cruiser frame is perfect for the beach or around the neighborhood. Fits riders 4’0” to 5’0” tall.
Single speed drivetrain is easy to use and maintain.
Rear coaster (pedal) brake provides intuitive stopping power.
Fenders help protect you from splashes and dust while adding vintage flair.
Extra-large spring saddle and upright riding position provide a comfortable ride.
